trans-unit.source: Returns information about errors encountered by the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInference"></xref> class while inferring a schema from an XML document.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class with the error message specified.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> objects specified that contain all the properties of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.
This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class with the error message specified and the original <xref:System.Exception> that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> specified.
An <xref:System.Exception> object containing the original exception that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class with the error message specified, the original <xref:System.Exception> that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> specified, and the line number and line position of the error in the XML document specified.
An <xref:System.Exception> object containing the original exception that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.
The line number in the XML document that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.
The line position in the XML document that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.

Streams all the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> object properties into the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object specified for the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object specified.
